data.text: Ne mma bɛyɛ atumfo wɔ asase no so;
Ahonya ne sika wɔ ne fi,
Sum mu mpo hann pue ma nnipa a wɔteɛ,
Yiyedi bɛba wɔn a wɔn tirim yɛ mmerɛw na wɔde fɛm kwa,
Ampa ara ɔrenhinhim da biara da;
Ɔte asɛmmɔne a, ɛmmɔ no hu;
Ne koma wɔ bammɔ, na onsuro;
Ɔtow nʼakyɛde pete aman so ma ahiafo nea wohia,
Omumɔyɛfo behu ama ayɛ no yaw,
